page.title: 07SHAMBLEHURST JUNIOR SCHOOL
page.content: This is one of the Prmary schools in Hedge End. It is for children between the ages of 5 and 11. At 11 the children usually transfer to Wildern Secondary School. The school day starts at 8.45am and finishes at 3.20pm.The headteacher is Mr R.Wyatt and there are 12 teachers in the school. There are lessons such as reading,writing,maths,science,projects ,music and physical education.The school has three BBC B Computers and they also watch school's TV programmes .Most of their work is written or drawn on paper. Some of the teachers run clubs such as swimming,rounders,football,cricket and table tennis.
